dcterms:creator: A. Saxena
S. Chakrabarti
P. Talukdar
dcterms:description: CronQuestions is the largest known dataset for temporal knowledge graph question answering, containing a Wikidata temporal KG and a collection of free-text questions. It includes 125K entities, 1.7K timestamps, 203 relations, and 328K facts in quadruple form, along with 410K unique question-answer pairs categorized by entity and time questions, as well as by reasoning complexity.
dcterms:title: CronQuestions

dcterms:creator: Z. Jia
Z. Pramanik
R. Saha Roy
G. Weikum
dcterms:description: TimeQuestions is a challenging dataset for temporal question answering, consisting of 16k manually tagged temporal questions divided into four categories: Explicit, Implicit, Temporal, and Ordinal, based on the type of time reasoning required.
dcterms:title: TimeQuestions
